item.description:
Looking forward to seeing everyone for discussions in Italian. What's your favorite Italian movie?

We will meet upstairs at Cafe Paradiso. John Jordan's classes are still going on in the downstairs room. If you are the first to arrive, feel free to come watch until others show up for the group.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano
